variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 2.00% on the portion of income up to $1,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 3.00% on the portion of income over $1,000 up to $2,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 4.00% on the portion of income over $2,000 up to $3,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 4.75% on the portion of income over $3,000 up to $150,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 5.00% on the portion of income over $150,000 up to $175,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 5.25% on the portion of income over $175,000 up to $225,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 5.50% on the portion of income over $225,000 up to $300,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 5.75% on the portion of income over $300,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_8 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all eight brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
